website_summaries.verdict: The AAXA LED Android, an LED-based mini-projector offers good quality in data images and a nice selection of ports for its size. And it integrates Android, letting you access apps and the Web, right on the projector.
pros: Can connect via Wi-Fi or Bluetooth
Shows photos, presentations, and video from USB memory key
cons: Using the Android OS all but requires a mouse
Menu systems are complicated to use
Shows scaling artifacts at native resolution

customer_reviews.title: Motor stopped working.
customer_reviews.text: At first, the projector was great. I bought it to use for work (self-employed consultant). The projector worked great at home, easy to use and set up. I needed an adaptor for my iMac but that was it. However, at my client off-site, it stopped working after about one hour. The motor just stopped running despite having power. I thought it may have overheated (which would not be great for only working for one hour) but a day later the motor starts and stops. This projector may have been a lemon. Other reviews about the projector were good so I was very disappointed in the projector.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.text: Nifty little helper for when I teach classes. Not all restaurants have projectors, and this little puppy gets the job done.
customer_reviews.author: Joe Lippeatt

customer_reviews.title: not great projection but quiet and super handy
customer_reviews.text: bluetooth enabled, not great projection but quiet and super handy. Essentially, can project from anywhere onto any surface.
customer_reviews.author: MarianTheLibrarian

customer_reviews.title: but I was able to use it a bit and it is indeed a great product. Performs as expected
customer_reviews.text: I purchased it for someone else, but I was able to use it a bit and it is indeed a great product. Performs as expected.
customer_reviews.author: Ignacio M.

customer_reviews.title: Wifi/blueTooth/netflix/e-mail/LED/Google Play
customer_reviews.text: Super bright, has WiFi, Google Play apps, manual focus, little/portable, VGA, has remore control. AWESOME!
customer_reviews.author: jjkng

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Super nice small projector . Slightly weird interface but I dont care. Its bright and it IS HD.
customer_reviews.author: Morgan

customer_reviews.title: This projector had a very nice picture. That is all I can say as ...
customer_reviews.text: This projector had a very nice picture. That is all I can say as far as any pros for this device. The cons were that this device was extremely difficult to use. The manual was not very helpful in figuring out any problems as it was very generic. The Bluetooth did not connect easily to any device I had. Don't be fooled, you have to be on Wifi to connect and show any pictures from your phone. I could not access some of the on screen menus as each time I tried, the screen went directly back to the main menu. I returned this item and will look for another.
customer_reviews.author: David L. Baade

customer_reviews.title: Good idea to comine the projector with browser BUT
customer_reviews.text: Did not like the color of the video on the screen and the 720 HD is not as sharp due to smaller optics and whatever. Returned unit. It is a good idea to have a very portable projector for travel or business presentations. The navigation of the remote is not easy and it is better off to hook your smartphone with the unit and can search much faster using the phone keyboard.
customer_reviews.author: Lion Michael

customer_reviews.title: its nice projector for its price
customer_reviews.text: Its an excellent projector... meets my requirements for watching movies, and client presentations . However the contrast could be a little better. For some reason netflix works with a lag. It keeps buffering every few mins. Youtube has similar issues as well I am able to get 150 inches diagonal display
customer_reviews.author: Raj

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: This projector is amazing except for the Bluetooth which either terrible.
customer_reviews.author: MEALS ON WHEELS OF CTRL MD

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very good projector. Small, portable, efficient. Noise while working is the only low point.
customer_reviews.author: Romeu Faustino

customer_reviews.title: While this came to me I had great expectations. so
customer_reviews.text: While this came to me I had great expectations. so...: 1. Color is limited 2. Brightness is good. 3. Screen mirroring - not working I tried it with Galaxy Note 3 , Galaxy Tab 10 - 2014 and Lenovo U310 - NOT working at all 4. HDMI cable - not working - I called the company for service and was told this is a known problem and they can't supply any solution for now. To sum: this is a low level instrument with poor support I see no reason for someone to buy it. A waste of money and time
customer_reviews.author: Doron R.

customer_reviews.title: stop working
customer_reviews.text: very disappointed #*%$^!~ it just Stop working two times after few hours of use I just kept it to cool down and in third one was no power at all in the projector it seems that there is issue with the power adapter
customer_reviews.author: Mohamed

customer_reviews.title: HORRIBLE!!
customer_reviews.text: I have to send it back. HORRIBLE!!!! Doesn't work at all....
customer_reviews.author: LB

customer_reviews.title: Those android features are pointless.
customer_reviews.text: Those android features are pointless. Feel like unfinished product. Returned.
customer_reviews.author: JJC

customer_reviews.title: Waste of money..
customer_reviews.text: After 10 months of using for around 4 to 6 hours week..i got a yellow tint all over the screen..😞😞😞..poor customer support..
customer_reviews.author: Gio

customer_reviews.title: It was okay, but although it said it was ...
customer_reviews.text: It was okay, but although it said it was Apple compatible it was not compatible with projecting from the Ipad. This was the purpose of the purchase and therefore we returned it.
customer_reviews.author: Mary Rodriguez

customer_reviews.title: projector light.
customer_reviews.text: Hi. I have brought this item not even a year, the light has dimmed. It is working but the image has dimmed very badly. To my experience, LED light do last for more than ten years. May I know how do I send it back for an exchange, as I believe it is still under warranty. Thanks.
customer_reviews.author: Elsa Yeung

customer_reviews.title: Better Than Expected - 9/10
customer_reviews.text: Honestly, I was a little skeptical given the quantity of reviews found online regarding this projector, but it was a good investment. Given the price, it's a fantastic piece of hardware. I quickly connected it up to our network and was streaming videos in no-time. The color and brightness is great and the size is convenient. The only cravat? It has a somewhat loud fan noise, but it isn't really noticeable when there is other audio going on. All in all, a great product and have not had any issues with it.
customer_reviews.author: Anon

customer_reviews.title: No intuitive friendly use.
customer_reviews.text: Very hard to handle keyboard,very unresponsive and display suddenly signs in Arabic or Chinese or whatever. You most be extremely patient. In order to pay for these device about 500. I do expect reliability. I think in general Pico projectors are still in the dark and that is why there are not popular. Yes is a good idea they almost there. But need to develop more thecnology. Lumens good, software terrible so unresponsive too. I would pay a lot less in order to put off with all issues and would use only for movies,because in order to use it with phones,tablets,is another headache and you need to buy cables about 25.00 and it does not work with all phones.
customer_reviews.author: anais nin

customer_reviews.title: Good product but have one major issue
customer_reviews.text: I received the package on time but it was missing the manual. No big deal, I can get the information online. The picture quality is great even in well lit areas and the set-up is really easy. It's great if you are traveling and need some entertainment. My only complaint is the USB ports doesn't function so I cannot view any files, movies, etc. with a USB device. I'm thinking about returning it.
customer_reviews.author: Coston Burnes

customer_reviews.title: I believe you'll be disappointed. I hope the company can make improvements
customer_reviews.text: While this unit has many attractive features, the quality of its display in both color and sharpness is very disappointing when projecting more than a few away--even in a darkened room. For viewing text, it's more than adequate. For other content, it's not. If you're thinking about this for watching movies, Amazon Prime, You Tube, HULU or Netflix, I believe you'll be disappointed. I hope the company can make improvements. It's a great concept. Just not acceptable picture quality.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Remote needed for mouse feature to easily navigate internet features
customer_reviews.text: Remote needed for mouse feature to easily navigate internet features. Seems to be working well so far. will update if any issues
customer_reviews.author: Rick R in Atlanta

customer_reviews.title: Was happy while it worked
customer_reviews.text: Was happy while it worked. Just plugged it in with my Xbox for the 2nd time to play some Fifa. Now will freeze as soon as you select the input source and will not turn off without unplugging from the power cord. Strange considering it is supposed to have a battery pack... would not recommend. I've hardly used this POS, spent $500 on it a year or two ago and now out of warranty. Way to go AAXA. Nice product you have here...
customer_reviews.author: Bradpen29

customer_reviews.title: This is junk. Software doesn't function properly and buttons ...
customer_reviews.text: This is junk. Software doesn't function properly and buttons are flaky. If you are only connecting with a cable then should work well, but then it's over priced. Again....junk!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Javier A

product_meta.title: AAXA LED Android Pico/Micro Projector with LED, WXGA 1280x800 Resolution, 550 Lumens, Android OS, WiFi, Bluetooth, HDMI, VGA, 20,000 Hour LED Life, DLP Projector
product_meta.description: Style:NewThe LED Android 4.2 Smart Pico Projector The Android 4.2 Smart Pico Projector allows you to access over 1 million apps on the Google Play Store. At the heart of this projector is a next generation LED (Light-Emitting-Diode) optical engine mated to Texas Instrument's DLP imager. The result is a more vivid, colorful image and a 20,000 hour life-span - ten times longer than a traditional lamp projector. Mobile Computing and Streaming Video Platform The AAXA LED Android Pico Projector incorporates a dual core Android 4.2 processor with 1GB of DDR RAM and 4 Gigabytes of onboard storage. Complete with embedded WIFI the LED Android Projector becomes a full-featured video-streaming projector capable of running apps, streaming movies, accessing e-mail, surfing the web, and more. With the AAXA LED Android Netflix , Hulu , HBOGo is all available in mobile big-screen format. Additional features include Google Play, document processing, and much much more. Brilliant 550 Lumen LED Projector The AAXA LED Android features native 720P (WXGA) resolution powered by a Texas Instruments DLP imager, 20,000 hour LEDs, and a brilliant 550 lumen light-source (with "boost" mode). All this is housed in a micro form-factor measuring just 5.9" x 5.2" x 1.4". The LED Android is a true mini projector capable of producing giant, deep, immersive video streaming, web-browsing, and game-play of up to 160" (in low light condition). A Big Projector in a Micro Projector Size The AAXA LED Android is a full-featured pocket able mini-computer. A variety of input sources include HDMI and VGA connections, a Composite Video input cable, and a USB memory stick port for media playback. Outputs include a 3.5mm headphone jack and onboard dual 2 watt speakers. Processing power is provided by a robust dual-core Android processor capable of rendering high resolution full-length movies and high megapixel digital pictures.
feature_bullets: Stunning 550 Lumen Optical Engine with 20,000 Hour LED Light Source
Android 4.2 Jelly Bean (Netflix, Hulu, HBO GO, etc.)

specifications.Customer Reviews: 3.1 out of 5 stars46 ratings3.1 out of 5 stars
